text: Uniondale is a hamlet and census-designated place (CDP) in Nassau County. Long Island, New York in the Town of Hempstead, United States. The population was 32,473 at the 2020 United States Census. In the 2010s, the nearby CDP of East Garden City became part of Uniondale in a controversial move. ==References== Category:Hamlets in New York (state) Category:Census-designated places in New York (state)
title: Uniondale, New York
